toProvideMaintainAndImproveOurServices: To provide, maintain, and improve our services.
toCommunicateWithUsersAndManageAccounts: To communicate with users and manage accounts.

termsOfUse: User Agreement and Terms of Service
welcomeToTchebaa: Welcome to TCHEBAA. This User Agreement and Terms of Service (“Agreement”) is a legally binding contract between you (“User,” “you”) and TCHEBAA (“we,” “us,” “our”). It governs your access to and use of our website, mobile application, and all associated services (collectively, the “Services”).
toUseCertainFeaturesOfTchebaa: To use certain features of TCHEBAA, you must register for an account. By doing so, you agree to:
provideAccurate: Provide accurate, complete, and up-to-date information.
maintainConfidentiality: Maintain the confidentiality of your login credentials.
beFullyResponsible: Be fully responsible for all activity that occurs under your account.
weReserveTheRight: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account if you provide false information or violate these terms.
youMustBeAtLeast: You must be at least 13 years of age to use our Services. If you are under 18, parental or guardian consent is required.
accessAdditionalFeaturesAsAPaidUser: Access additional features as a paid user.
useThePlatformForIllegal: Use the platform for illegal or unauthorized purposes.
postContentThatIsDefamatory: Post content that is defamatory, obscene, or infringes on third-party rights.
interfereWithTheProperWorking: Interfere with the proper working of the Service.
certainFeaturesOfTchebaa: Certain features of TCHEBAA may be available through a paid subscription or one-time payment model. By purchasing a service:
youAuthorizeUsToChargeYourPaymentMethod: You authorize us to charge your payment method.
youAcknowledgeThatFeesAre: You acknowledge that fees are non-refundable unless otherwise stated.
weMayChangePricing: We may change pricing, with advance notice.
youMayUploadOrShare: You may upload or share text, photos, event details, and other content. You retain ownership of this content, but grant TCHEBAA a worldwide, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, and display it for service functionality and marketing. We reserve the right to remove any content that violates these Terms or applicable law.
someFeaturesRequireAccessToYourDevice: Some features require access to your device's location. By using these features, you consent to TCHEBAA collecting and using location data to provide relevant services and recommendations. You may disable location tracking at any time via your device settings.
yourUseOfTheServicesIs: L'utilisation du Service est soumise à notre Politique de Confidentialité, qui explique comment nous collectons, utilisons et protégeons vos données personnelles.
weMaySuspendOrTerminate: We may suspend or terminate your account without notice if:
weSuspectFraudulent: We suspect fraudulent or abusive behavior.
weAreRequiredToDo: We are required to do so by law or policy.
youMayDeleteYourAccount: You may delete your account at any time through your settings. Termination does not release you from any payment obligations incurred before termination.
allTchebaaContentBranding: All TCHEBAA content, branding, software, and technology are protected by intellectual property laws. Except as expressly authorized, you may not reproduce, modify, or distribute our content.
tchebaaMayLinkToOrInteractWith: TCHEBAA may link to or interact with third-party services. We are not responsible for third-party content, terms, or privacy practices. Use them at your own risk.
tchebaaIsProvidedAsIs: TCHEBAA is provided 'as is' and 'as available.' We make no warranties regarding uptime, accuracy, or performance. Use of the Service is at your own risk.
toTheFullestExtentPermitted: To the fullest extent permitted by law, TCHEBAA shall not be liable for:
anyIndirectIncidental: Any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.
lossOfDataIncomeOrReputation: Loss of data, income, or reputation.
errorsOrDowntimeInTheService: Errors or downtime in the Service.
youAgreeToIndemnify: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless TCHEBAA and its affiliates from any claims, liabilities, or damages arising from your use of the Services, your content, or your violation of this Agreement.
thisAgreementIsGovernedByTheLaws: This Agreement is governed by the laws of the State of Texas, without regard to conflict-of-law principles. Any disputes shall be resolved through binding arbitration or in the courts of Bexar County, Texas, unless otherwise required by law.
weMayUpdateTheseTerms: We may update these Terms from time to time. When we do, we will provide notice via email or in-app notification. Continued use of the Service after changes go into effect means you accept the updated terms.
ifYouHaveQuestionsOrNeedSupport: If you have questions or need support, contact us:
thisDPAIsEnteredIntoBetween: This DPA is entered into between:
definesTermsLikePersonalData: Defines terms like Personal Data, Processing, Data Subject, etc.
processorWillOnlyProcessPersonalData: Processor will only process Personal Data as instructed by the Controller for TCHEBAA servicepurposes.
assistInDataSubjectRightsCompliance: Assist in data subject rights compliance.
permittedWithContractualSafeguards: Permitted with contractual safeguards and prior notice to Controller.
processorEnsuresComplianceUsingStandardS: Processor ensures compliance using standard safeguards.
controllerMayRequestAudits: Controller may request audits or documentation to verify compliance.
processorHelpsController: Processor helps Controller respond to requests.
dataWillBeDeletedUponTermination: Data will be deleted upon termination unless retention is required by law.
eachPartyIsLiableForItsOwnBreaches: Each party is liable for its own breaches.
lawsOfTexasUSA: Laws of Texas, USA. Disputes resolved in Bexar County, TX.
controllerAndTchebaaToSignAndDate: Controller and TCHEBAA to sign and date.
